text: Zangley Dukpa (born 2 February 1950) is a Bhutanese politician who has been a Bhutan Peace and Prosperity Party (DPT) member of the National Assembly of Bhutan from 2013 to 2018. He also served as Minister of Health of Bhutan. He obtained a master's degree in education from the University of Bristol in 1983. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the University of Bristol Category:Bhutanese MNAs 2013–2018 Category:21st-century politicians Category:Druk Phuensum Tshogpa politicians Category:Bhutanese politicians Category:Government ministers of Bhutan Category:Druk Phuensum Tshogpa MNAs
title: Zangley Dukpa
